My Team
() => { team.forEach((person) => { if (person.role === "Manager") { return `

${person.name}

${person.role}
  • ID: ${person.ID}
  • Email: ${person.email}
  • Office number: ${person.officeNumber}
` } else if (person.role === "Engineer") { return `

${person.name}

${person.role}
  • ID: ${person.ID}
  • Email: ${person.email}
  • Github: ${person.github}
` } else if (person.role === "Engineer") { return `

${person.name}

${person.role}
  • ID: ${person.ID}
  • Email: ${person.email}
  • School: ${person.school}
` } }) }
